ygData.subject: Re: Who cast the first stone, anyway?
ygData.msgSnippet: ... That s a bug?  I thought it was a cheap way for Verant to work around the minimum displayed weight value being 0.1.  I was always miffed that I d be
ygData.messageBody:
On Tue, 29 Jun 1999, Jim Mattson wrote:
>
> I wonder if there is really anyone on this list who doesn't cheat. For
> example, what about the bug that makes up to 20 stacked items weigh the
> same as just one? How many of you exploit that bug on a daily basis to
> carry more than your weight allowance? Oh, is it just me? Heh. Oops.
> I guess I'll be going now.

That's a bug? I thought it was a cheap way for Verant to work
around the minimum displayed weight value being 0.1. I was
always miffed that I'd be carrying just one of these items,
but I was being weighted as if I were carrying 20. :-)

--
John H. Kim
kim@...
